trans-unit.source: After enabling the fields by a click, information will be sent to %s. This information will possibly be stored and processed. Storage may happen outside of the EU. Click on the %s to read more.
Enable permanently and accept data transmission:
2 Clicks for more privacy: Click to enable the button. Send your recommendation to %s with the next click. By activating the service information will be sent to third parties - see %s
